english.segment1: Well cry like a baby. "C" moon, "C" moon. So where do you go?. Up high, under low. The devil I know said. "Something is missing". Outside it's hot, the first of July. And the look in your eye said. "Something is missing". Midnight she cried like a baby. "C" moon, "C" moon, "C" moon. Cried like a baby. Can this be something. We can't understand?. Could it be the girl. Can't understand?. Where will we go?. Up high, under low. The devil I know said. "Something is missing". Sweet little angels sing. 'Bout the fast pace of things. But earth children sing. "Love will conquer anything". Midnight she cried like a baby. "C" moon, "C" moon, "C" moon. Cried like a baby. Could it be. We can't understand?. Can it be that we can't. Cry, cry, cry, cry like a. Midnight, cry like a. Whisper, scream like a baby. Cry, cry like a baby. Could this be. Something we can't understand?. Cry like a baby, cry like a baby. Could this something that we. Can't understand, understand?. Well cry like a baby. "C" moon, "C" moon
